body_html:
I had this issue and it's probably due to compiling protobuf with a different compiler.
Since for tensorflow we use gcc-4.8 explicitly, we should also compile protobuf with gcc-4.8 as well. This fixed my problem. So just use "make CXX=g++-4.8" when you build protobuf.
body_text:
I had this issue and it's probably due to compiling protobuf with a different compiler.
Since for tensorflow we use gcc-4.8 explicitly, we should also compile protobuf with gcc-4.8 as well. This fixed my problem. So just use "make CXX=g++-4.8" when you build protobuf.
body:
I had this issue and it's probably due to compiling protobuf with a different compiler.
Since for tensorflow we use gcc-4.8 explicitly, we should also compile protobuf with gcc-4.8 as well. This fixed my problem. So just use "make CXX=g++-4.8" when you build protobuf.
